Class AdaBoostM1W

              +--oaidtb.boosters.Booster

                    +--oaidtb.boosters.AdaBoostM1

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ErrorUpperBoundComputer, IterativeUpdatableClassifier, MulticlassExtensibleBooster, weka.core.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler
public class AdaBoostM1W
extends AdaBoostM1

A modification of AdaBoostM1 which works better with weak base classifiers; for more information see:

[1] - Günther Eibl & Karl Peter Pfeiffer How to make AdaBoost.M1 work for weak base classifiers by changing only one line of the code.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé
See Also:

Calculate the classifier's vote weight in the final combined hypothesis based on its error.
Overrides:

Parameters:

Returns:
The classifier's vote weight in the final combined hypothesis

defaultTooBigErrorValue

protected double defaultTooBigErrorValue()
The default error value for which the algorithm will stop to iterate following the customizable criterion of the number of (consecutive or not) retries the base classifier reaches a error worse than this value.
Overrides:
defaultTooBigErrorValue in class AdaBoostM1
Returns:
The ad-hoc stopping criterion proposed in [1]

Initialize the guessing error of the training set upper bound.

getErrorUpperBound

public double getErrorUpperBound()
Get the guessing error upper bound. See [1] for more info.
Overrides:
getErrorUpperBound in class AdaBoostM1
Returns:
The guessing error upper bound or -1 if no iterations have been done.

updateErrorUpperBound

protected void updateErrorUpperBound(double error)
Update the theoretical guessing error upper bound.

  - Note that if the error of the base classifier is greater than 1/m_NumClasses the bound is undetermined,
    and so its calculation will be aborted.
Overrides:
updateErrorUpperBound in class AdaBoostM1
Parameters:
error - The current base classifier's error

Returns:
The error upper bound string (by example, "Training error upper bound.")
